allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_Name -match ''python|docker|terminal64''} | Select-Object Name, Id, CPU | Format-Table -AutoSize")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add auto trading features and fix HMM training

- Add auto sync database on startup \(MT5 -> TimescaleDB\)
- Add AutoTrading status check with Telegram notifications
- Add /test_buy and /test_sell commands for manual testing
- Add /autotrading command to check MT5 algo trading status
- Fix HMM regime detector covariance error \(normalize features\)
- Use diagonal covariance for better stability
- Fix position dict for MT5 TradePosition attributes
- Add run_surge.bat launcher script with live logging

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Telegram notifications for trading conditions

- Add regime change notifications \(BULLISH/BEARISH/SIDEWAYS\)
- Add POI detection notifications \(new bullish/bearish zones\)
- Add price at POI zone alerts
- Add entry trigger confirmation notifications
- Add periodic status updates \(every 30 min\)
- Add debug logging in main loop for diagnostics
- Track previous state for change detection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cmd /c "docker info >nul 2>&1 && echo Docker running || echo Docker NOT running")
